Package com.enttribe.hrms.repository

Interface LeavesRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves,Integer>, GenericRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves,Integer>
@Repository @Transactional(readOnly=true) public interface LeavesRepository extends GenericRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.Leaves>
The LeavesRepository interface is a extension of GenericRepository. It's purpose is to provide additional methods that are specific to the Leaves entity. see GenericRepository see JpaRepository

  • Method Details

    • getUnpaidLeaveCount

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value="SELECT sum(LEAVE_TAKEN) FROM LEAVES WHERE LEAVE_TAKEN is not NULL and APPROVAL_STATUS=\'Approved\' and FROM_DATE <=:toDate AND TO_DATE >=:fromDate AND EMPLOYEE_ID =:employeeId AND LEAVE_TYPE_ID =:leaveType ;") Long getUnpaidLeaveCount(Date fromDate, Date toDate, Integer employeeId, Integer leaveType)

    • getMaxEndDate

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value="SELECT MAX(TO_DATE) AS end_date \r\nFROM LEAVES \r\nWHERE LEAVE_TAKEN is not NULL and APPROVAL_STATUS=\'Approved\' and FROM_DATE >= :fromDate \r\n AND TO_DATE <= :toDate \r\n AND EMPLOYEE_ID = :employeeId AND LEAVE_TYPE_ID=:leaveType ;\r\n") Date getMaxEndDate(Date fromDate, Date toDate, Integer employeeId, Integer leaveType)

    • getAllEmployeeLeaveCount

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value="select EMPLOYEE_ID,sum(LEAVE_TAKEN) from LEAVES where LEAVE_TAKEN is not NULL and APPROVAL_STATUS=\'Approved\' AND LEAVE_TYPE_ID=:leaveType and FROM_DATE <= :toDate AND TO_DATE >= :fromDate group by EMPLOYEE_ID;") List<Object[]> getAllEmployeeLeaveCount(Date fromDate, Date toDate, Integer leaveType)

    • getTotaldayCount

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value="SELECT DATEDIFF( :toDate , :fromDate) AS days_difference") Long getTotaldayCount(Date fromDate, Date toDate)
